about_the_game:
Extract Resources

You are an ambitious capitalist, but all successes start small. The game begins where you are assigned a single plot of land. What lies under the surface? If you’re lucky, you will discover and extract an abundance of resources. Use the appropriate vehicles to drill for oil and mine precious metals. You can also cut down trees and break open rocks to obtain raw materials.

Process them

With your newly collected materials, you will move onto the next step in your venture. Seek out the many specialized factories to process your materials. What are you interested in manufacturing? Produce basic products such as iron cube, lithium battery, plastic, polyester, glass, and copper wire. Then, you can take it one step further and make complex products like cars, laptops, statues, and even houses.

Sell Your Products

Put your business skills to the test by bringing your stock to the market to sell to dealerships, boutiques, and a variety of other stores. But you must be savvy, as buy and sell prices are always fluctuating like in the real world.

Expand Your Business

As you extract more resources, process them, and sell your products, you will open yourself to more opportunities to grow. Expand your business by purchasing more plots of land and vehicles. Extract even more resources at faster rates, process them, manufacture more items, then sell them until you become the richest in the land!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3330 or AMD FX-8320 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon R7 265 or better (min 2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: These system requirements can´t cover all possible system configurations so issues could occur that influence the functionality in some cases.
